ygData.subject: Re: Sigh - Armor woes
ygData.msgSnippet: patty, Save up and buy banded...its not that expensive nowadays...plus its way lighter and more ac than ring or chain...id go banded if i were you. John
ygData.messageBody:
patty,

Save up and buy banded...its not that expensive nowadays...plus its way
lighter and more ac than ring or chain...id go banded if i were you.
John Zwanenburg
